models

Class DiffractionGrating

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.DiffractionGrating

  • public class DiffractionGrating
extends java.lang.Object
    This class sets up a circular aperture diffraction experiment and has functions to compute the distance between angles and the distance between different orders of diffraction

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double lineDensity
      The Line density.
      private double mmScreenDistance
      The Mm screen distance.
      private double mmWavelength
      The Mm wavelength.
      private double slitSeparation
      The Slit separation.

      constructor for grating experiment

                          double mmScreenDistance,

        constructor for grating experiment
        Parameters:
        mmWavelength - wavelength of light source in millimeteres
        mmScreenDistance - distance from screen to aperture in millimeters
        lineDensity - slits per millimeter
